https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oZqOzX7hThHRiUsGIQ65nxHuC4o.jpg A gas leak explosion at a yakuza hideout provides a shy nurse and a rental car clerk with the opportunity to take a briefcase full of money. A cross-country chase ensues. Adrenaline Drive
